statements: DELETE FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_id = 100 AND claim_status = 'Approved';
DELETE FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_amount < 5000 OR payout_amount > 2000;
DELETE FROM payouts WHERE payout_amount > 1000 AND payout_status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM claims WHERE claim_amount < 5000 OR claim_status = 'rejected';
DELETE FROM claim_payout WHERE payout_amount > 1000 AND payout_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM claim_updates WHERE updated_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'pending' AND policy_holder_name = 'John Doe';
